text: Pedro Pascual (born March 15, 1996) is an American competitive sailor. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the men's RS:X. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:American sailors Category:Olympic sailors of the United States Category:Sailors at the 2016 Summer Olympics – RS:X Category:Pan American Games medalists in sailing Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for the United States Category:Sailors at the 2019 Pan American Games
title: Pedro Pascual (sailor)
